net.sky.network

Class CNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sky.network.CNetwork

  • public class CNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    represents a network without any learning rules

      void addSynapse(CSynapse synapse)
      add a synapse to the network and add the synapse to the defined source- and destination- neuron
      void execute()
      - clear all synapses - send the current value from all neurons into all output synapses - response all values into all neurons from input synapses
